CreateTexture(int, int, Color[], TextureOptions)

Creates a texture of the provided size and fills it with the provided colors.

public static ITexture CreateTexture(int width, int height, Color[] colors, TextureOptions options = TextureOptions.None)

Parameters

width int

The width of the texture, in pixels.

height int

The height of the texture, in pixels.

colors Color[]

The data of to fill the texture with. Must be of length width * height.

options TextureOptions

A TextureOptions value which influences the behavior of the texture.

Returns

ITexture

The new texture.
